name: Space Phoenix - Shoot'em all
description:
Greetings Commander! Welcome to Space Phoenix - a classic shoot'em up game!
Now the destiny of mankind is counting on you once again. You must pilot your trusty fighter jet and take down the enemy while weaving through a barrage of bullets!
Let's Shoot'em up and Shoot'em all!

Game Features:
CLASSIC: Classic Shoot 'em up that'll take you back to your younger days.
CHALLENGING: Tons of levels to challenge yourself in exciting battles!
VARIOUS WEAPON UPGRADES: Pick one from three random upgrades in this Tactical Rogue-Like.
HD GRAPHICS & EFFECTS: Fascinating Sci-fi graphics and gorgeous SFX makes this a feast for the senses.

If you encounter any issues during the game, feel free to send us feedback via the in-game Customer Service Center or any of these:
FB: https://www.facebook.com/SpacePhoenixOfficial
Discord: https://discord.gg/4zCusHrHqz
E-Mail: support@magicsporegames.com
